meanings.definition: A companion or partner who provides assistance or support.
meanings.sent1: My loyal helpmate always stands by my side when I need assistance.
meanings.sent2: She is not just my friend, but also my helpmate in times of need.
meanings.sent3: My furry helpmate, my dog, always cheers me up when I'm feeling down.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of life, a true helpmate is like a guiding star in the dark night.
meanings.sent5: Having a reliable helpmate makes every challenge seem conquerable.

meanings.definition: To assist or support someone in their efforts.
meanings.sent1: I always try to helpmate my friends whenever they need a hand.
meanings.sent2: We should helpmate each other to achieve our common goals.
meanings.sent3: He decided to helpmate his brother in building a treehouse in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement helpmated him to push through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The coach's guidance helpmates the team to victory.
